name: get_current_count
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool counter.
Tool description: Count views on your website or any other specific action on your application.
API description: This function retrieves the current count from a specified API without increasing it. It allows customization through various parameters including `clabel`, `color`, and `idv`. The function makes a GET request to the API and returns the response in JSON format if possible, otherwise, it returns the response text.

clabel.description: A label used to specify a category. Defaults to 'blue'.

color.description: A color value for the request. Defaults to 'red'.

idv.description: An identifier for the request. Defaults to 'sample'.
